author: ddaina
body:
This change reverts crabserver to the state that we had before #6621 PR was merged in terms of WMCore version used. In addition to that, we also remove 3 packages that are not needed for crabserver: `py2-mysqldb, py2-sqlalchemy, py2-httplib2`.

FYI @belforte
title: Revert crabserver to use 1.3.6.crab6 WMCore tag
